Author: colazerocultleader
Text: I'm so sorry for what you are going through. after one small binge you won't gain any significant amount. even after a few it would be so minimal.. you are okay. maybe you will be a bit bloated today but after a few days the water will be gone and you will be perfectly fine and I would bet you will not recognise any difference. be easy on yourself, it's holidays :) also maybe try to give upping your intake a thought, that could prevent another binge

Author: IDKijustdrinkhere
Text: You will not gain actual weight from this. You are allowed to enjoy food on this occasion (and any other occasion you see fit). I hope you are able to enjoy your day tomorrow, including eating. Merry Christmas to you, my friend.
